flexflux.general

Class CplexBind

  • java.lang.Object
    • flexflux.general.Bind
      • flexflux.general.CplexBind

  • public class CplexBind
extends Bind
    CPLEX version of Bind. It transforms porblem's variables, constraints and interactions into Objects usable by the CPLEX solver.
    Author:
    lmarmiesse 6 mars 2013
